attributes.action: make Irish Republic nationals to produce their Passports on entering the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland as do all other foriegn people do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eire (The Irish Republic) is a foriegn state and like all other nations French, Dutch, USA and so on they SHOULD on entering the UK produce a passport, as should UK citizens on entering Eire
